title: PM, Culture Adviser discuss promotion of national heritage
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP): Adviser to the Prime Minister on National Heritage, Culture, Political and Public Affairs Engineer Amir Muqam called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here Friday and discussed matters related to promotion of national heritage.
The meeting discussed issues pertaining to the National Heritage and Culture Division.
Overall political situation also came under discussion.
